title: Power Rankings: The NBA Cup is here â€” so is a chance for these teams to get right
description: Milwaukee, Philadelphia and New York were all expected to challenge the Celtics. The first portion of the season has not gone as planned.
author: Yahoo Sports
excerpt: With the NBA Cup tipping off, let's run through the league from worst to first.
text: Welcome back to the internet's definitive NBA Power Rankings, where for free we have vibe checked all 30 of the league's teams and sorted them into so perfect an order that you could not possibly complain.If you would like to file an official complaint, please contact Adam Silver at the NBA's front office. He can remind you that any power ranking is a subjective exercise that has no bearing on who will actually win the NBA championship. He should also inform you that, yes, Ben Rohrbach's power rankings are the best.Let's get to them.(Amy Monks/Yahoo Sports Illustration)
html:
Welcome back to the internet's definitive NBA Power Rankings, where for free we have vibe checked all 30 of the league's teams and sorted them into so perfect an order that you could not possibly complain.

If you would like to file an official complaint, please contact Adam Silver at the NBA's front office. He can remind you that any power ranking is a subjective exercise that has no bearing on who will actually win the NBA championship. He should also inform you that, yes, Ben Rohrbach's power rankings are the best.

Let's get to them.
